#text=One day my bicycle tire got flat due to hitting some glass in the street .
#text=I then had to walk the rest of the way home .
#text=I took it into my garage and tried to repair it by putting some duct tape on it and pumping it with air .
#text=This , however , only made matters worst and all the air ended up making another hole in my tire because I over inflated it .
#text=I decided that I had no other options and I ordered a new tire on Amazon for my bike .
#text=Once that came in the mail it was time to repair my broken bike .
#text=I got a socket wrench and unscrewed the nut of the bike that attached to the wheel .
#text=After that I got my new bike tire and put it on the frame of the bike and screwed it back on .
#text=Once that was complete my bike was as good as new and I was back to riding my daily bike trail by my house .
